meanings.definition: A competition or event involving various skills related to road maintenance or driving.
meanings.sent1: The annual roadeo tested the participants' abilities in road maintenance tasks.
meanings.sent2: The roadeo brought together skilled drivers to showcase their talents.
meanings.sent3: At the roadeo, the contestants raced to fix potholes in record time.
meanings.sent4: Winning the roadeo felt like conquering a challenging obstacle course.
meanings.sent5: The roadeo was a thrilling display of precision and expertise in roadwork.

meanings.definition: A gathering or festival celebrating road construction or maintenance workers.
meanings.sent1: The community organized a roadeo to honor the hardworking road maintenance crew.
meanings.sent2: Everyone eagerly awaited the annual roadeo, a time to appreciate road workers.
meanings.sent3: The roadeo featured a parade of colorful construction vehicles, much to the delight of the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The roadeo transformed the usually busy street into a festive and lively celebration.
meanings.sent5: Children waved excitedly as the roadeo procession passed by, cheering for the workers.
